name: Raze (WuzHizFace)
description:
Raze is an FPS shooter game set in a post-apocalyptic abandoned city where players must fight for survival against hordes of demons. The game is inspired by classic FPS games such as Doom, with an emphasis on fast-paced action and momentum based gameplay. Players will take on the role of a lone survivor, armed with an arsenal of powerful weapons and abilities, as they battle through hordes of demons.

If you'd like to just explore without worrying about enemies, you can enable cheats in game by pressing pause (escape) -> Settings -> Cheats. There, you can enable cheat health to become effectively immortal, cheat damage to one shot anything, or change the current wave.

This is my first publicly available game and was made in only about 3 weeks, so feedback is much appreciated!
